item.title: Root-Xmas 2025 | Writeup Selection
item.description:
Once more, Root-Xmas was back this year, and once more, it was the highlight of the month ðŸŽ€

To speak my heart, I really learned a lot during this CTF as the web aficionada that I am had to get out of her comfort zone to tryhard reverse, hardware, crypto and pwn,etc. In fact, from each challenge, I not only gained a flag, but also a new trick I learn. I did not flag everything actually, only 20 among the 24 challenges and finished 12th/2500 players (promise will do better next year)
